alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 3:36PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Flagler and southeastern St. Johns Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 335 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Marineland, or 10 miles northwest of Palm Coast, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marineland and Crescent Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
